legal: API Terms of Service: Please link back (with follow, and without nofollow!) to the URL on Rise and mention Rise as a source, so we get traffic back from your site. If you do not we'll have to suspend API access.

jobs.title: Engineering Manager REMOTE
skills_suggest: Deep Oracle NetSuite engineering experience (SuiteScript, SuiteCloud/SDF/SDN familiarity).
Proven experience managing and mentoring engineering teams.
Strong source control and release management practices (branching, CI/CD).
Experience or exposure to Payments and embedded payments integrations (strong asset).
Data fluency and strong analytical/problem-solving skills.
Excellent interpersonal and cross-functional communication skills.

descriptionBreakdown.oneSentenceJobSummary: Lead a remote NetSuite engineering team at a fast-growing Accounts Receivable Automation and Payments leader, driving technical strategy, delivery, and team development.
skillRequirements: Deep Oracle NetSuite engineering experience (SuiteScript, SuiteCloud/SDF/SDN familiarity).
Proven experience managing and mentoring engineering teams.
Strong source control and release management practices (branching, CI/CD).
Experience or exposure to Payments and embedded payments integrations (strong asset).
Data fluency and strong analytical/problem-solving skills.
Excellent interpersonal and cross-functional communication skills.
